startpromote-text-intro: Check! You are ready to part-up. We'll share your part-up with other uppers. You can also share it in your own network or social media
startpromote-text-intro2: This is what your post looks like.
startpromote-notify-copy-to-clipboard-er: Somehow copying the part-up link failed. Please try again.
startpromote-notify-shared-error: You already shared your part-up on %s.
startpromote-notify-shared-success: Your part-up is now shared on %s.
